name: @u4/opencv4nodejs
description: Asynchronous OpenCV 3.x / 4.x nodejs bindings with JavaScript and TypeScript API.

scripts.install_Mac: npm run build && CXXFLAGS="-std=c++14 -Wno-c++11-narrowing" node ./install/install.js --version 4.5.3 build
scripts.install_default: npm run build && node bin/install.js rebuild
scripts.install_ubuntu: echo call: sudo apt install libopencv-dev; build-opencv --incDir /usr/include/opencv4/ --libDir /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/ --binDir=/usr/bin/ --nobuild rebuild
scripts.install_macm1: npm run build && node bin/install.js --version 4.5.4 --flag="-DCMAKE_SYSTEM_PROCESSOR=arm64 -DCMAKE_OSX_ARCHITECTURES=arm64 -DWITH_FFMPEG=ON" rebuild
scripts.install_cuda: npm run build && cross-env OPENCV4NODEJS_DISABLE_AUTOBUILD= node bin/install.js --version 4.6.0 --flags="-DWITH_CUDA=ON -DWITH_CUDNN=ON -DOPENCV_DNN_CUDA=ON -DCUDA_FAST_MATH=ON -DWITH_FFMPEG=ON" rebuild
scripts.install_4_6_0_cuda_30XX: npm run build && cross-env OPENCV4NODEJS_DISABLE_AUTOBUILD= node bin/install.js --keepsource --version 4.6.0 --cuda --cudaArch=8.6
scripts.test: cd test && pnpm install && pnpm run test
scripts.samples: cd examples && pnpm install && npm run build && node ./src/templateMatch/multiMatchBench.js && node ./src/templateMatch/multiMatchColision.js && node ./src/applyColorMap.js && node ./src/asyncMatchFeatures.js && node ./src/faceDetect/asyncFaceDetection.js
scripts.do-build: npm run build && node bin/install.js --version 4.6.0 --jobs MAX build
scripts.do-rebuild: npm run build && node bin/install.js --version 4.6.0 --jobs MAX rebuild
scripts.build-debug: npm run build && BINDINGS_DEBUG=true node bin/install.js rebuild
